sustainablehealthsolutionsllc.bitecounter

Class Counter

  • java.lang.Object
    • sustainablehealthsolutionsllc.bitecounter.Counter

  • public class Counter
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is awesome. It holds all the information you'ld need for a bite counter.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getLimit()
      This is an accessor function that returns the limit of the counter class.
      int getNumBites()
      This is an accessor function that returns the Counter objects number of bites.
      boolean getPastLimit()
      This getter determines whether or not the number of bites is higher than the limit.
      void incrementBite(android.content.Context context)
      This function increments the number of bites by 1.
      void reduceBy20()
      This function takes the current limit and reduces it by 20 percent.
      void resetCounter()
      This function simply sets the number of bites back to zero and sets the pastLimit boolean to false.
      int retrieveBites(android.content.Context context)
      This function finds the number of bites from the previous section and returns it to whatever function is calling it.
      int retrieveFriday(android.content.Context context)
      This function retrieves fridays bites from shared preferences.
      int retrieveLimit(android.content.Context context)
      THis function retrieves the limit from shared preferences.
      int retrieveMonday(android.content.Context context)
      This function retrieves mondays bites from shared preferences.
      int retrieveSaturday(android.content.Context context)
      This function retrieves saturday's bites from shared preferences.
      int retrieveSunday(android.content.Context context)
      This function retrieves sunday's bites from shared preferences.0

      This function retrieves thursday's bites from shared preferences.

      This function retrieves tuesday bites from shared preferences.

      This function retrieves wednesday's bites from shared preferences.
      void saveBites(android.content.Context context)
      This function saveds the numBites into a location on the machine that allows a person to quit the app and restart it with the correct number of bites still being displayed.

      • getPastLimit

        public boolean getPastLimit()
        This getter determines whether or not the number of bites is higher than the limit. If it returns true than it's past the limit. If it returns false it isn't past the limit.
        Returns:

      • incrementBite

        public void incrementBite(android.content.Context context)
        This function increments the number of bites by 1.

      • reduceBy20

        public void reduceBy20()
        This function takes the current limit and reduces it by 20 percent.

      • resetCounter

        public void resetCounter()
        This function simply sets the number of bites back to zero and sets the pastLimit boolean to false. It doesn't change the limit though.

      • saveBites

        public void saveBites(android.content.Context context)
        This function saveds the numBites into a location on the machine that allows a person to quit the app and restart it with the correct number of bites still being displayed.
